create-links-with.short_description: `create-links-with` is a turtle procedure that creates a link between the current turtle (self) to every member of a provided agentset. (compare with `create-link-with`, which creates a link from the current turtle to a *single* other turtle).

in-radius.short_description: `in-radius` is used when you want to select all agents within a certain radius of the current agent.

max.short_description: `Max` reports the maximum value in a given list. It takes the form of `max some-list`. For example, `show max [1 2 3]` will return 3.

to.short_description: `To` is used to begin a command procedure. You can think of *to* as a way to define a set of actions/verbs for NetLogo such as `to go`, `to add-money`, etc.

n-of.short_description: `n-of` is used when you want to randomly select exactly n elements out of an agent set.
